website_summaries.verdict: An elegant bathroom mirror that offers unparalleled flexibility.
pros: Frameless bathroom mirror offers a stylish choice in a modern or traditional bathroom
Includes pivoting hardware that enables you to adjust the mirror's angle any time you choose
Boasts a brushed nickel finish that is both water- and fingerprint-resistant
Backed by a lifetime manufacturer's warranty
cons: Overall quality leaves much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Classy, elegant, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought it to go with my Moen Preston collection towel racks and tp holder. Blends nicely. Holds the angle where you put it. Allows for half body view. Makes my small bathroom feel bigger. Easy to install. 15 mins. Oval shape helps conceal that my light is not perfectly centered with the vanity lol. I like the beveled edge and that it comes with proper mounting hardware. Was packaged nicely. No damage upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W.

customer_reviews.title: Package came undamaged, but  content was.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Product came with cracked mirror. I did not think to open the box to inspect content condition because both shipping and product package arrived undamaged, I assumed content would be damage free; my mistake there. By the time I was ready to open the box, only to see the cracked mirror, it was too late to request a new one or refund. Wasted $65.11.
customer_reviews.author: Hanh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but be mindful
customer_reviews.text: The look of this mirror is fabulous and it was easy to install. One thing to be cautious of is that, unlike a mirror that's flush with a wall, be mindful of the fact that this stands away from the wall a few inches. That means if your medicine cabinet opens to the wall where this mirror is installed, you run the risk of hitting the mirror with the medicine cabinet door.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Comes with idiot proof installation template
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid and well priced mirror. The installation was a breeze because it comes with an idiot proof template for your drill holes so no need for any measurements. Just make sure your template is leveled and mark your holes and thats it. It took me less then 5 minutes to hang it on the wall and thats because i had to make sure the template was dead centered due to the way my wall is (see photo). I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, wrong finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these great looking mirrors for a bathroom remodel project. The came to our property where my daughter immediately put them in storage until I could install them. Months later, I installed them only to find they we were both an oil rubbed bronze finish instead of the polished nickel finish I ordered. Every thing in the bathroom is polished nickel. The packaging even said it was polished nickel. I am disappointed with this error.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: ... upper light but they installed well and look exactly like I envisioned
customer_reviews.text: I almost thought two would be too big for the 65 in wall with an upper light but they installed well and look exactly like I envisioned. Product arrived quickly and easy to store until bathroom buildout finally happened.
customer_reviews.author: Materiel Grrl

customer_reviews.title: The template is 1/4" off.  Beware!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute, but the template is off by 1/4"! Of course once the holes are drilled and the anchors are in, it's impossible to move it by 1/4," but it's also impossible to install that way. After about an hour of trying to make it work, I had to move the mirror down about 2" from the original placement so I could redo and add the extra space needed. With a company like Moen, I was extremely disappointed. I assumed the template would be right on and that everything would have been perfect. It looks great, but now I have a HUGE amount of patching and touch up that I'll have to do.
customer_reviews.author: katniss

customer_reviews.title: Nice and accurate price
customer_reviews.text: Prime delivery, same price as local retailers, and wasn't damaged in any way unlike my toilet and backsplash of vanity from Home Depot. For those who use install directions, my husband said they are frustrating as far as the sequence he should have done each step. My bathroom is not finished so I have not used it yet but I will update any concerns when and if they occur. It is the perfect size for medium or small size bathroom. Our light is 36 inches and vanity 40 inches in width for size comparison in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install with quality components
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom badly needed a replacement mirror to match the frameless shower door. I found other brands that looked similar, but was concerned about the build quality. This Moen mirror however, is well built and the anchors are extremely sturdy. I have not had any "scares" when adjusting the mirror - or worries about it falling off the wall or it's anchors/harness. Additionally it comes with the mounting template which makes it super easy to line up with a level and pre-drill the holes. Installation was very quick and cleanup likely took longer!
customer_reviews.author: Erik B

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We did a wood accent wall in our bathroom, and these mirrors are perfect for not covering up the whole thing. They sit an inch or two off the wall, so you can still see the wall behind. They're a good size and adjustable (tilt up or down). They come with a template on the instructions so you know where to drill the holes. Since we basically have a wood floor on our wall, we did not need the drywall anchors and just used regular wood screws.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Look very expensive - beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new house that had these mirrors and I love them. One of them wasn't installed properly and my daughter knocked it off while trying to clean it. Found this replacement on Amazon for a VERY reasonable price. Installed it properly this time (which wasn't entirely easy, but definitely doable), and it's back in business! LOVE these mirrors. They look much higher end than the price would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mirror. Easy (for my husband) to install - the template for mounting is sort of camouflaged on the instructions, you have to look closely to notice it, but its there and it makes the installation quite simple. The mirror is just perfect above my bathroom sink and vanity. I did receive the first one with several cracks, which seems to be a common occurrence from reading other reviews. I was promptly sent a replacement, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Installed this mirror above my pedestal sink and it looks great. Packaging was good, mirror was in perfect condition. Installation was a little tricky but not too bad. Mirror looks great and the tilting feature is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive DIY
customer_reviews.text: We had an ugly old medicine cabinet and my wife said I was crazy when I took this project on by my self without having any clue what to do! Thanks to YouTube this project was done easily and almost looks professionally done! I impressed myself! Probably saved hundreds on the item and install compared to the ones at big box stores and having a pro install it for me!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: GREAT OPTION WHEN YOU HAVE AN OBSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we have wainscoting that extends from part of the wall about 1.5 inches. A regular mirror would not hang flush, but because this has mounts that extend the mirror out about 2 inches it works great. Installation was very easy using the template and the tilt on the mirror is adjustable. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: tbird

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Loving this mirror! It's a great value for the money, in my opinion. It looks nice and thanks to the included template, it is easy to mount. Very stable once it is up. Overall, I'm quite pleased. The only issue I had with this was that the first one I received was broken - it had clearly been returned and send back out, because it was missing a lot of packaging. My second one seemed new and was absolutely lovely. I would definitely suggest giving this a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Kas-cle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror. I had my bathroom remodeled and I wanted a mirror that would create a WOW appearance. For me this filled the bill!! I cannot attest to the easy/difficulty of installation as it was done by a professional but he did not complain so I assume it was not too difficult. I love the pivoting feature!!
customer_reviews.author: MRS. HOLLYWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, beautiful presentation
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are gorgeous. We replaced a 6 foot contractor mirror in our master bath and these are a HUGE improvement. Since they tilt you can get a full body view without having to climb up on the bathtub which is great! The mounts are very secure and with the mounting template they were incredibly easy to install. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customers, Beautiful Mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirrors! Our business is home improvements. We ordered two of these for over a double sink vanity we installed in a bathroom remodel. They looked and felt like sturdy, good quality mirrors and looked beautiful in the bathroom. The paper template included for installation made the hanging straightforward and easy to make the mirrors level and even with each other. The clients loved the look. We may remodel our own bathroom and consider these for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a clean, unique design. The installation was relatively simple, but you will need to have a good level, tape measure and measuring skills. Installation took about 20-minutes, triple checking my measurements and making several adjustments to get it placed just right. Hanging the mirror will take two people, as it can be difficult to get the mirror onto both cleats and secured without a second set of hands.
customer_reviews.author: m priem

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: We used these in our bathrooms in our last home in Ca., then we moved to Georgia. So, there I was 6 months later doibg another 2 bathrooms and replacing the HUGE wall mirrors with one of these over all 4 sinks (2 per bathroom). Nice touch, good quality and easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Y Nantell

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit large for my half bath but looks beautiful. I listened to one review and used those little bumper pads on the back so it wont shatter the mirror when it hits the wall due to the swivel. I installed mine on wood look wall tile. Took 30 mins installation with just myself. Most of time was drilling hole in tile for anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are fantastic for the price! I wasn’t sure what to expect but the reviews were good so I decided to go for it. They were as nice as described and not hard to install. I am so happy I didn’t buy the super expensive ones I originally found that looked just like these!
customer_reviews.author: tina m crawford

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty mirror - love that it swivels
customer_reviews.text: Love that the mirror moves I was able to mount it high enough for my husband and I can just tilt the mirror down to use it. It's very pretty and was fairly easy to install. I would buy another one if I needed another mirror.
customer_reviews.author: CCF

customer_reviews.title: looks gorgeous in my office bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is exactly what I needed. I love that it tilts, which is helpful for ADA compliance, and that it sits away from the wall, which is perfect because there's a nearby electrical outlet. And it's pretty! My husband installed it, and he seemed to have an easy time doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Morela Aldona

customer_reviews.title: Bad items received
customer_reviews.text: This mirror would have been perfect if it wasn’t broken! The first one was missing hardware so it was returned. The second one arrived smashed. Returned that one too. Went elsewhere to get one.
customer_reviews.author: House Queen

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Arrived with 4 Large Cracks.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived with 4 horizontal cracks. I am so disappointed. I had already torn up the box it was shipped in before discovering the cracks. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Simple
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived in excellent condition with all of the necessary pieces for hanging including the screw jackets for mounting in drywall (vs wall studs). Tools required for mounting are a drill, hammer, screwdriver, level, tape measure and pencil. Installation and mounting was simple enough for one person with minimal skills. It took me less than a half hour. The mirror pivots on its two side mountings, which have enough tension to hold it in place at whatever angle you wish. The chrome mounting hardware is beautiful. It coordinates very well with the other chrome bathroom accessories in the Moen Glenshire line, which I also installed.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice addition to bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, for the most part the set up is easy, they give you instructions with measurements, and you just use the level to put your screws in and make sure it’s good. The only set back was we chipped a small piece off the side when trying to put it on the clips. Nothing noticeable but could be made of better quality, but it is light weight and a nice addition to our bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lani L.

customer_reviews.title: Arrive Broken
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. This was clearly returned previously...shattered...and just taped up and sent along to me. I wondered why there was no additional outer box for protection, but guess they didn’t need it since they sent it already shattered. It looks like it would be a beautiful mirror if it had arrived intact!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors are just what I wanted. The only issue I had was with the delivery. USPS did not follow instructions to leave pkg. next door if no one was available to accept. This left the pkg. a target for theft.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Mirror, mirror on the wall
customer_reviews.text: We had seen this product in stores but it was always sold out. The mirror was packaged very well and arrived in perfect condition. We are using this in a small guest bath. The mirror is on the small side but perfect for our needs. The tilt feature allows for different statures.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is bigger than I expected - probably my fault for not reading the details carefully. But it is good quality and looks very smart. So, now I'm happy to have bigger-than-I-expected mirror; it gives you plenty to look at, and it has a sophisticated style. The tilt is more useful than I thought it would be, given that people of different heights use the mirror. Quality of the mirror and the fittings is good.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks good
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it behind the bathroom door and it's depth is small enough to allow that. You can only see it when the door is closed because of the layout of the room but it is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyD

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my small guest bathroom remodel. Arrived on time, package was undamaged. The mirror was easy to install, but did take two people to install it. So far, I'm happy with my new mirror
customer_reviews.author: Mia_Shops2much

customer_reviews.title: Mounting holes are crooked
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered one and it was broken, they sent another and the holes are drilled crooked in the glass so the mirror is slightly crooked. We have since ordered two replacements. They are all crooked. No the holes in the wall are not crooked. We traced the mirror and the holes on a paper, flipped the mirror and lined it up with the tracing and the holes didn't line up. This means the holes in the mirror are not aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Bobalink

customer_reviews.title: Perfeft
customer_reviews.text: First time I got it was cracked but they sent me a new one quick overall great coustmer service. very nice mirrior was very easy to install I love it completes my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully simple
customer_reviews.text: In the past, we purchased this type and brand in the big box store. We received item as described. One mirror was chipped (sliver) but still useable so we decided to keep it and install. Fairly simple but was curious as to why manufacturer did not have a rubber cushion between mirror and hardware as in the older mirror. Still came out looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and works as described
customer_reviews.text: Assuming you use the installation template they provide, it is easy to install and works very well. I like the tiltable feature, and unit looks very nice. Quality appears to be excellent
customer_reviews.author: RIJIM

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the looks of this mirror. Bought two of them for our pool bath to replace a huge mirror during a renovation. These provide just as much coverage and look much better. Installation was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Finishing touch on a bathroom remodel. Easy to install and works well. Love the tilt. Nicely packaged and shipped. No bad issues at all! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After a long awaited master bath remodel with gorgeous tiling and the perfect paint color to compliment we were looking to replace a mirror that just no longer went with the decor. After visiting two big name home improvement stores and not seeing anything in stock that I thought would work I started searching sites and after a couple of days of searching and measuring and visualizing I decided to give this a try. Others had given it a great review. My husband and our contractor were both very impressed. It couldn't be more perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reading is Fun

customer_reviews.title: It is very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We shopped hard for mirrors and these were extremely affordable and beautiful! One arrived broken but Amazon replaced it immediately and shipped it at no charge to where we were which was not at home. Never even left the comfort of home! Recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Order double what you need and hopefully only half will break during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself is nice and seems like it would be easy to install. However, Amazon ships it in the original packaging only so there is very little chance that you will receive a mirror that is not broken.
customer_reviews.author: LikeABoat

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble. Took me about 20 minutes in total. Could be done by one person, but keep in mind that it's fairly heavy so it's helpful to have a second person hold one side when it comes time to lift it into place. I don't really use the "swivel" mechanism, but it's a nice feature. The satin nickel hardware matches other pieces with the same finish, regardless of brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful item. Just the right size for a small bathroom or as one of a pair for a larger one. The slight tilt which it allows means that you can hang it at just about any height and still be o.k. Easy to install, too. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mirror for a half bath. The only bad thing about this mirror is after installing to the wall it is very difficult to take down. The 2 holes on each side will crack when trying to remove the mirror because they are tightly set in place. So make sure that all areas of the wall where the mirror is being install is clean and ready before installing.
customer_reviews.author: llewis

customer_reviews.title: Great spin to traditional
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay in the bathroom of my rental property. Didn’t love it, but it could just be that I set my design expectations too high. Decently priced for a spin to your traditional square/rectangular mirror .
customer_reviews.author: Faye Blue

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror ever!!
customer_reviews.text: In renovating my bathroom this functional mirror was a welcome change to the ugly mirror I had before. I am very satisfied with this mirror. Of course its a "Moen". Strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nprince

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I installed 3 in under about an hour. Two in master bath and one in the powder room. A little small for master bath but perfect for a powder room.
customer_reviews.author: Guy P.

customer_reviews.title: Easily Installed Mirror that is great for someone in a wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was very easy to install and the tilt works perfect for my mom who is in a wheelchair. They broke the first mirror in delivery but quickly replaced.
customer_reviews.author: M. David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy looking! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and classy! Looks so nice in our bathroom, simple but very pretty. We always get compliments on the mirror when people come in to the bathroom. Love how it swivels too!
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to get this. Installation was easy. Looked great for the five minutes I had it on the wall. The one screw holding the plastic nut on back,broke off causing the mirror to fall and split right down the middle, across to the other bracket that was still attached to the wall. Needless to say I'm not happy 60 dollars is now sitting in the trashcan, in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled my bathroom and was resistant about buying this after reading some bad reviews. So glad I bought it. This one Is less expensive than Lowe’s. This mirror is what makes my bathroom look so good. It is stylish and modern and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: m miller

customer_reviews.title: They are great about not being too big or too small
customer_reviews.text: We placed these in a house that we are flipping and they worked perfectly! They are great about not being too big or too small. Perfect in a smaller bathroom or one with multiple vanities. We did receive the incorrect finish on one of ours during our first order but it was fixed immediately when I contacted amazon. I had the replacement within 2 days and free shipping to send the other back!
customer_reviews.author: amp

customer_reviews.title: Moen Oval Tilting Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought tilting beveled mirrors from a high-end retailer, for 3 times the price, so when I saw this one, I thought I would try it. I was afraid they would appear cheap, but they are gorgeous! I bought 2 of them to go over both sinks in the guest bathroom, and they are definitely the focal point. They look much more expensive, love the beveled edge and the hardware they hang with. Easy to install also.
customer_reviews.author: robinbbrn

customer_reviews.title: Give an elegant touch to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item and the mirror arrived broken, but in a quick reply from the seller I received the replacement immediately. And I was able to make the return immediately. The mirror is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Flores

customer_reviews.title: could not be happier with the purchase I'm a contractor by trade
customer_reviews.text: super cute very high quality and easy to install. This mirror fits in well to any decor and I'm incredibly happy my choice. I have a small farmhouse bathroom and did not want a mirror to take up a lot of presents in the room this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: staci Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased...no QA.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. My contractor was starting to install 2 of the mirrors and 3 of the 4 brackets to hold the mirrors the screws would not come out. I tried calling Moen and they are closed.....not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd mirror I purchased. They are beautiful and well made! Packaged very securely. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous mirrors! We have an angled ceiling and these were perfect for my husband, since he’s much taller than I.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. 1st one I received was broken but I was sent a replacement and it was great. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bath remodel. Very well packaged for protection. Reasonably easy to install and complements a very dated space.
customer_reviews.author: Firewalker

customer_reviews.title: great tiltable mirror
customer_reviews.text: what a great mirror. the fact that it tilts makes it an great mirror. otherwise it would be just a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a safe and reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. Give on time. same as the description It is a safe and reliable product
customer_reviews.author: Augusto A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition to the bathroom. I like having the ability to move the mirror. The mirror is large enough and thick not to mention very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bathrooms look great
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled both of our bathrooms and these accoutrements really do the trick to finishing off the bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Mirror on the....
customer_reviews.text: I mean for less than $50 bucks, I meannnnnnn....it’s great size, for my half bath, it’s clean, it’s simple. It did what it needed to do! And that’s MIRROR me! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Especially for the price, this is beautiful AND adjustable! Our installer LOVED it. We use it in our cabin but my family member uses 2 for her kids' double sinks.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mirror. We replace the mirror in our community clubhouse. It was in the handicap bathroom so this one was perfect for us to abide by all of the correct requirements. It is very attractive looking on the wall. The directions and installation were very easy. I would highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Came in BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Came in broken!! I ordered this item in July 2019 for a house renovation. Just opened the item and noticed it came broken. Our return deadline was in August. Mistake not to open right when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: JMontalvo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was terrible, obviously not a one person job. Then when it came time to screw the mirror in the mirror chipped!!! It was a gift and past return date, what a piece of garbage. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: jjpishposh

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased w/ Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Like the tilt and size, it was simple to install and looks beautiful. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kudo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are beautiful and very stylish. They really help bathroom to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: JCR Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror!! Can be a little difficult to hang- be sure you hang it in the center!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: unable to install
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward to try to get the parts lined up to install. I finally gave up and glued the mirror to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror it was a pain in the butt to install but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Thank heavens my construction guy was there to put it up. It is perfect for my powder room! Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Connie Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of the mirror. Wish it could pivot side to side as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Finish

customer_reviews.title: Floating mirrors did an excellent job
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these mirrors. Updating a very tired old bathroom and a remodel bringing the family bathroom up to date took some time but these mirrors really finished off the room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dwainlondon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mirror! The little nuts to secure the mirror were a little sketchy.. They kind of tighten up.. secure, but will keep an eye on since this is at work
customer_reviews.author: HFS

customer_reviews.title: Fits well over 30 inch vanity
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition. Easy to drill holes in the correct spot with included template. I was concerned it wouldn't be large enough but the pivot allows for a better viewing area and I think it looks proportionate over our 30" vanity. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Need to put foam on back tips to prevent breaking when you tilting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: Just remodeled my bathroom And this Moen mirror looks just beautiful !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful,simple, clean mirrors fit my bathroom perfectly. Size is perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to replace that standard large glued to the wall square mirror in my master bathroom. I have a double vanity and have one of these mirrors hung above each vanity. They look great. Different, clean and simple! Which is exactly what I wanted. They were pretty easy to hang, need two people and will have an awkward moment or two but not that big of an issue. Love them and already my bathroom looks different than any one else's I know, which I greatly appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Large slightly downward tilted oval mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Large slightly downward tilted oval mirror. I'd have preferred a circle but wasn't available. You have to hold it up slightly to see the back of your head in the medicine cabinet on the facing wall. The mirrors look nice. I have two separated by two shelves Moen DN7790BN. They do look good together. I also have the Preston towel bar Moen DN8424BN and toilet paper holder Moen DN8408BN. Although they are a little different, they are on different walls so look fine.
customer_reviews.author: iefbr14

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily. Be sure to attach the mirror to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, seems to be high quality. Installed easily. Be sure to attach the mirror to the wall fasteners before mounting the fasteners. It is possible to mount the mirror after the wall fasteners are attached, but you;d have to work blind and it is exceedingly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Came broken twice, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: So this mirror came broken TWICE, but I'm very happy I held out for the third one. It's easy to install and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and looks great with the rest of our chrome fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Moen Moen on the wall, Moen is the best of all...
customer_reviews.text: We selected two Moen oval tilting mirrors to replace a single 4'X10' mirror and the look helped bring the remodel project into the new Millennium - a terrific selection for matching the sink with the tub and human Moen IOdigital shower set up. Thanks Moen and Amazon.com for making our remodel selection set so easy to match and receive all deliveries in two days!!! Again, we are happy returning customers.
customer_reviews.author: James Thrifty Shopper Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed yet but it is the perfect size and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: CJHILL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror. It tilts so you can adjust it to where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great value, $15 cheaper than local store
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality!! That is why l bought MOEN, always! Easy and very accurate instructions, looks great perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: kevin kane

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional mirror at a terrific price
customer_reviews.text: Glenshire oval mirror by Moen is really a beautiful addition to our powder room. It is well made, and the price is phenomenal. After seeing the same type and style of mirror for at least $150.00 in catalogues, then finding it here on Amazon under $100.00 was truly a welcomed bargain. The package was shipped with care, and arrived quickly. If you want a great value at an equally tremendous price, then this mirror should be your first choice!
customer_reviews.author: Summerwind

customer_reviews.title: Glamorous and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and gives the small space a glamorous feel. Comparable with the pottery barn mirrors this style that are way more expensive. Very well made and sturdy. Our contractor did say these “types of mirrors” are a pain to install but he got it up in a matter of minutes. Will definitely be getting these for our master bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley k.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mirror and mounting
customer_reviews.text: perfect mirrors for my bathroom. The hardware is top notch and installs easily. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. A bit of a pain to install but for the price, its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jeff goforth

customer_reviews.title: Tilt mirror
customer_reviews.text: Handyman had it up in 20 minutes. Sturdy and lite weight. Tilts great. Love love it. So reasonably priced. Looks beautiful in my bathroom. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rona Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful. Adds a touch of elegance to my bathroom. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Living Life Wright Over 50

product_meta.title: Moen DN2692BN Glenshire 26-Inch x 22-Inch Frameless Pivoting Bathroom Tilting Mirror, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:NickelGive your bathroom a clean, modern look with the Moen Glenshire Oval Tilting Mirror. With hardware available in chrome and brushed nickel finishes, this frameless beveled mirror tilts to allow you to easily adjust the angle. The Glenshire Mirror comes with mounting hardware and a convenient template that help take the guesswork out of installation. It is backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty. Corrosion resistant.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Infuse sophistication and serenity into your bath or spa area with the Glenshire coordinating designs. The Glenshire oval tilting mirror in the brushed nickel finish has soft, smooth lines and the simplicity of the design will add a calm, relaxed air to any space. Easy to install, create your own oasis with these featured designs in minutes. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: WARM AND INVITING: Brushed Nickel finish provides a lightly brushed warm-grey metallic look
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with other Moen bathroom accessories
YOUR BEST ANGLE: Tilting mirror allows you to find your best angle
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty
